title: Dark Hollywood - Volume 2
description: 10 suspenseful cinematic themes with multiple loops and shorter edits
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


"Dark Hollywood - Volume 2" features 10 suspenseful themes suitable for sci-fi, survival, horror, tension and futuristic projects delivering the iconic Hollywood sound with dark ambient music featuring many sync spots making the editing easier.


  • The Darkest Ambient: Full length (02:06), 2 Light versions, 3 Short edits, 9 Loops
  • Industrial Suspense Background: Full length (01:31), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Dark Tension Ambient Drone: Full length (01:34), 2 Short edits, 4 Loops
  • Horror Background Drone 02: Full length (01:55), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • Stranger Tension 16: Full length (00:53), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • Stranger Tension 17: Full length (01:26), 2 Short edits, 4 Loops
  • Stranger Tension 18: Full length (01:08), 1 Short edit, 5 Loops
  • Stranger Tension 19: Full length (01:47), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Stranger Tension 20: Full length (01:53), 2 Short edits, 3 Loops
  • Stranger Tension 21: Full length (01:09), 2 Short edits, 3 Loops


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Check also Dark Hollywood - Volume 1

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Full length tracks (+ 2 Light versions)
  •  18 Short edits
  •  47 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 74

Number of Audio Cues: 74

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 68:06

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
